description: Container images managing tool. Some subcommands such as pull, push, copy, etc. have their own usage documentation. More information: https://github.com/google/go-containerregistry/blob/main/cmd/crane/doc/crane.md/.

useCases.description: Allow image references to be fetched without TLS:
